Given the current state, my avatar is located at (7, 1) and surrounded by various elements. The exit is directly located to the right at (7, 14) and there is a switch at (7, 17), which can potentially help us navigate the level better.

Since the immediate goal is to reach the exit while avoiding the pursuer at (7, 25), I need to be cautious. Currently, my avatar can stand or crouch, which can help avoid detection from the pursuer and navigate through tunnels.

Since my goal is to reach the exit directly, first, I will move right towards the exit sprite. I will take the action to move to the right to get closer to the exit and assess the situation further. 

``` Action:2 ```

This action is a strategic move towards the exit, moving me one step closer while keeping an eye on the pursuer's potential movements.
